deviceLink.title: Device not linked
deviceLink.description: Your OverTheBox is not yet linked to your account. Follow the steps below to complete the setup.
deviceLink.step2: Connect it to the Internet via Ethernet cable
deviceLink.step3: Wait for the LED to turn solid green
deviceLink.req1: OverTheBox plugged in and powered on

noPayment.title: Payment method required
noPayment.description: You must add a payment method to activate your OverTheBox.

noSubscription.title: No OverTheBox
noSubscription.description: You don't have an OverTheBox yet. Discover how to aggregate your Internet connections.
noSubscription.benefit1Desc: Combine up to 4 Internet connections for more bandwidth.
noSubscription.benefit2Desc: Automatic failover if one connection goes down.
noSubscription.benefit3Desc: Connect to your local network from anywhere.

notActivated.title: Pending activation
notActivated.description: Your OverTheBox is being delivered or waiting to be activated.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.desc: Your package is on its way

connection.title: Connection
connection.desc: Connect the device to the Internet

activation.title: Activation
activation.desc: Link the device to your account

notFound.title: OverTheBox not found
notFound.description: The requested OverTheBox service does not exist or is not accessible.
notFound.reason2: The service has been terminated or deleted
notFound.reason3: You don't have access rights to this service
notFound.reason4: The URL is invalid or corrupted
